data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of West unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of West, Nepal
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in West.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in West, Nepal.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in West, Nepal.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Brahmin Sakaldwipi people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Brahmin Sakaldwipi people know you.
Spirit, cause the 5,513 believers in West to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in West, Nepal that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in West, Nepal.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

location.name: West
location.people_groups_list: Brahmin Sawaria, Brahmin Kanaujia, Bhoi Nikhad, Bhoi Mallah Mewat, Chamar (Hindu traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Brahmin Sawaria (5,400), Brahmin Kanaujia (6,100), Bhoi Nikhad (1,900), Bhoi Mallah Mewat (7,100), Chamar (Hindu traditions) (320,000)
